objects.description: The Net utility is a component of the Windows operating system. It is used in command-line operations for control of users, groups, services, and network connections.Net has a great deal of functionality,[[Citation: Savill 1999]] much of which is useful for an adversary, such as gathering system and network information for [[Discovery]], moving laterally through [[Windows admin shares]] using net use commands, and interacting with services. Aliases: Net, net.exe

external_references.description: Microsoft. (2006, October 18). Net.exe Utility. Retrieved September 22, 2015.
Savill, J. (1999, March 4). Net.exe reference. Retrieved September 22, 2015.

objects.name: Net
